title: WTB: T206 Matty white, Evers portrait, any Tinkers

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Matty white, Evers portrait, any Tinkers
posts.post_content:
Next ones on my list....
If anyone has any available, please let me know.
Tougher backs would be nice too, but not necessary.
Thanks

$379 delivered, including insurance and delivery confirmation.   PayPal OK.
